overview:
Although I’m a technologist at heart I have a passion for innovation and the creative process, the Internet and all things digital. Having been involved with the Internet since the beginning from both commercial and technical perspectives I find I now sit in the middle - combining these to deliver real world results. In a world where user experience is king its critical to understand why as much as what both for the consumer and the business.

Having a hands on approach and a thrust to learn new things has always helped to give me a practical understanding of what makes things tick, from social marketing through to cloud computing. Over the years I’ve been very fortunate to work with some great names, on some fantastic projects, in a huge range of industries. Its these experiences and their challenges that motivate me to get involved with new projects where I can help to make things happen -this is one of the reasons why I really enjoy the start-up environment and working with great teams.
